title: Local Development Cluster
description:
Local k3s development environment on macOS following four-phase architecture.

Implements architecture decisions from ADR-001: dual Colima VMs (k3s-dev + k3s-capi), x86_64-linux via Rosetta for production parity, sslip.io DNS, step-ca local TLS, sops-secrets-operator, Cilium CNI.

Components: NixOS VM image, Colima profiles, k3s server module, Cilium CNI, step-ca ACME, cert-manager, sops-secrets-operator, storage provisioners, easykubenix stage configuration.

References:
- docs/notes/development/kubernetes/decisions/ADR-001-local-dev-architecture.md
- docs/notes/development/kubernetes/workflows/01-environment-setup.md
- docs/notes/development/kubernetes/workflows/02-local-development.md

title: Local cluster verification and testing
description:
Verify local development cluster matches architecture. Test: VM image boot, k3s startup, Cilium CNI activation, pod scheduling, cert-manager ACME flow with step-ca, sops secret decryption, storage provisioning.

Verification checklist:
- colima ssh --profile k3s-dev (SSH access)
- systemctl status k3s (k3s running)
- kubectl get nodes (Ready state)
- kubectl get pods -n kube-system (Cilium running)
- kubectl get certificates (cert issuance)

Reference: docs/notes/development/kubernetes/workflows/02-local-development.md
